PageTitle: Affiliate Program. Earn money online with ONLYOFFICE | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Join the ONLYOFFICE Affiliate Program and get up to 50% commission. Sell world best Cloud Office and self-hosted solutions as an affiliate!
HeroTitle: Earn with the ONLYOFFICE program for affiliates
ReasonsToJoin: Reasons to join the ONLYOFFICE affiliate program
CollaborativeOnline: Collaborative online document editors to integrate into any business platform or to use within a co-working space with customizable rooms for any business purpose.
Reason1Text: You will receive from 18% commission per sale at the start. The longer you participate in the program and the bigger the sum of your monthly sales, the higher commission rate you will get.
Reason2Text: We provide professional support for both our users and affiliates as well as regular software updates.
Reason3Text: You will get paid for both the initial sale and each time your customers renew their subscriptions.
Reason4Text: We provide you with marketing materials, explain our product and their target audience.
Reason5Text: You will get your payouts through a reliable and secure channel â€“ Rewardful, simple and user-friendly affiliate software by Stripe.
Reason6Text: Each customer who will obtain our product from you, automatically gets the status of your client.
RegisterInRewardful: Register as an affiliate in Rewardful.
GenerateYourPersonalAffiliateLinks: Generate your personal affiliate links, place them on your website and start selling
